title: Foxconn teams up with Nvidia on AI factory infrastructure development
description: Taiwan-based manufacturing giant Foxconn announced that it will partner with U.S. artificial intelligence chip designer Nvidia Corp. to develop AI factory infrastructure, as per a report by Focus Taiwan.
content:
New Delhi [India], October 16 (ANI): Taiwan-based manufacturing giant Foxconn announced that it will partner with US artificial intelligence chip designer Nvidia Corp. to develop AI factory infrastructure, as per a report by Focus Taiwan.

title: Google ad campaign showcasing AI’s impact on small businesses shines spotlight on Stourbridge glassmaker
description: A Google ad campaign highlighting how artificial intelligence (AI) is revolutionising small businesses across the UK is shining a spotlight on a Stourbridge glassmaking company.
content: Blowfish Glass, based at the Red House Glass Cone in Wordsley, is among 10 small businesses featured in the tech giant’s 10 Stories campaign which aims to show how AI tools such as Google Workspace with Gemini are proving game-changers for entreprene... [641 chars]

title: Apple’s newly tapped head of ChatGPT-like AI search effort to leave for Meta
description: The Apple Inc. executive leading an effort to develop AI-driven web search is stepping down, marking the latest in a string of high-profile exits from the company's artificial intelligence division.
content:
The Apple Inc. executive leading an effort to develop AI-driven web search is stepping down, marking the latest in a string of high-profile exits from the company’s artificial intelligence division.

description: The AP government has signed a mega deal with Google to set up a USD 15 billion gigawatt-scale Artificial Intelligence data centre in Visakhapatnam.
content:

title: Apple launches iPad Pro, Vision Pro and MacBook Pro with M5 chip
description: All three devices look identical to the current versions but swap out their processors for the company's first M5 chip, which provides improvements to computing speeds, graphics and artificial intelligence tasks, the company said.
content:
Apple Inc rolled out updated versions of the iPad Pro, Vision Pro and entry-level MacBook Pro with the new M5 chip, refreshing the products just ahead of the all-important holiday season.

title: "Will Increase Addiction And Loneliness"
description: He warned against developing artificial intelligence that is designed to emotionally or sexually influence human users.
content: Indian-origin Republican leader Vivek Ramaswamy on Wednesday voiced strong criticism against OpenAI's decision to introduce an "Adult Mode" in ChatGPT. He called it a "troubling" move that could lead to the sexual and emotional manipulation of users.... [2333 chars]

title: Vivo releases OriginOS 6 globally, bringing AI-driven design and smoother performance
description: Vivo unveils its new operating system, OriginOS 6, globally. This update brings significant advancements in artificial intelligence, user interface design, and system performance. Key features include the Origin Smooth Engine for enhanced responsiveness and vivo AI tools for seamless interactions. The OS also prioritizes user privacy and battery efficiency.

title: OpenAI Pivot to Porn Is Problematic
description: When you’re building artificial intelligence to benefit humanity, you might have to compromise. AI is expensive, so you raise billions of dollars from investors like Microsoft Corp, Nvidia Corp. and the United Arab Emirates. As you strive to build super-intelligent computers that will cure cancer, you also need to make money for your backers. title: A R Rahman Partners With Google Cloud To create AI-Powered Metahuman Band ‘Secret Mountain’
description: Oscar-winning composer A R Rahman has joined hands with Google Cloud for his new project Secret Mountain, a metahuman digital avatar band that blends artificial intelligence, music and storytelling to create a next-generation entertainment experience.

title: China seeks stronger ties with France in strategic dialogue
description: Civil nuclear energy, artificial intelligence and new energy are among areas for more cooperation. Read more at straitstimes.com.
content:
BEIJING - China expressed willingness to strengthen high-level exchanges with France in a strategic dialogue between Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi and France’s presidential diplomatic adviser, according to a foreign ministry statement on Oct 16.
